word:
"Verily I say unto you," Christ said to the Pharisees, "That the publicans and the harlots go into the kingdom of God before you. For John came unto you in the way of righteousness, and ye believed him not: but the publicans and the harlots believed him: and ye, when ye had 


                    - 17 - 

seen it, repented not afterward, that ye might believe him."
